title: PMS 2.0 302 - OVERREACTION MONDAY, NFL Week 12 Recap, Jarvis Landry, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys overreact to everything that happened in week 12 of the NFL season including whether or not the Buccaneers and Bears are both dead, which coaches are on the hot seat after Matt Patricia and Bob Quinn were both fired in Detroit, who they were most impressed by this week, and give some thoughts on tonight's Monday Night Football game between the Seahawks and the Eagles. Joining Pat and AJ Hawk is 5x Pro Bowler, current WR for the Cleveland Browns, Jarvis Landry to chat about the culture change in Cleveland, why he believes they're getting the right amount of respect in the media, and what he's been doing this season (34:25-50:06). Next, 9 year NFL vet, co-host of the Man-To-Man podcast, Everything DB, Darius Butler joins the show to chat about everything that happened this weekend in the NFL, what bets he likes for tonight's Monday Night football game, and his thoughts on the Nate Robinson vs. Jake Paul boxing match from this weekend (50:08-1:10:13). Later, Pat and AJ Hawk cover everything from from week 12 in the NFL, chat about which coaches they think might be on the chopping block, who they like it tonight's game, and everything else going on in the NFL (1:12:50-1:37:01)
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
